UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Mining Amphibian and Insect Transcriptomes for Antimicrobial Peptide Sequences with rAMPage.
Literature.Author: Lin D, Sutherland D, Aninta SI, Louie N, Nip KM, Li C, Yanai A, Coombe L, Warren RL, Helbing CC, Hoang LMN, Birol I

Literature.Title: Associating Biological Activity and Predicted Structure of Antimicrobial Peptides from Amphibians and Insects
Literature.Author: Richter A, Sutherland D, Ebrahimikondori H, Babcock A, Louie N, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=>128µg/ml)
